titles.title: Hear These Praises from a grateful heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hear these praises from a grateful heart
Each time I think of you the praises start
I love you so much, Jesus, I love you so much
Lord I love you, my heart sings
In your presence carried on your wings
I love you so much, Jesus, I love you so much.
Now my soul longs for you
Longs to worship you forever
In your power and majesty
I lift my hands, I lift my soul
I lift my voice toward the heavens
For you are my sun and shield
